%% Mermaid: Cost breakdown by model size (Compute vs Storage)
%% Article 07 - Building Language Giants
%% Source for: assets/07-building-language-giants/images/bar-chart-showing-cost-breakdown-for-small-medium-and-large-llm-training.svg

%%{init: { 'theme': 'neutral', 'logLevel': 'fatal' } }%%
xychart-beta
  title "Cost breakdown by model size"
  x-axis ["7B","70B","175B+"]
  y-axis "Relative cost (normalized)" 0 --> 100
  bar "Compute" [20, 65, 100]
  bar "Storage" [8, 25, 40]

%% Notes:
%% - Values are normalized for illustration; tune to match actual estimates.
%% - Render via Mermaid CLI (mmdc). If xychart-beta isn't supported in your runtime, request a flowchart-based bar fallback.
